rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BMS11, BUS1100, ETC1000, ETG1102, ETP1100, ETW1000, ETW1100, ETW1102, ETX1100, PMM2020, SCI1020, STA1010}
Must be enrolled in course version {B2007, D0502}

description: Introduction to spreadsheeting. Descriptive statistics. Elementary probability. Discrete and continuous probability distributions. Statistical inference. Simple linear regression and correlation. Forecasting and time series. Index numbers.
